content: these little **christmas stockings** are designed for beginner knitters so you do not need any sock making experience to knit these decorations you can knit the bottom of the stocking in stripes or one block colour and the top can be knitted in a rib pattern or seed stitch british moss stitch designed by amanda berry @fluffandfuzz the stockings are knitted in acrylic dk yarns on single pointed needles not in the round **needles** a pair of 3 75mm straight single pointed knitting needles us 5 **recommended yarn** stylecraft special double knit double knitting/light worsted weight 100% acrylic a few grammes in each shade **notions** tapestry needle for seaming and a crochet hook to crochet a single chain to make the hanging loop **sizes** one size only - 8cm tall without the loop **techniques** for beginners and above other techniques used include seaming knits purls increases and decreases **pattern info** this knitting pattern is a pdf download 3 pages and written in english patterns for personal use only not for resale copyright © 2011 amanda berry all rights reserved
